data.text:
Do you remember when was the last time you slept like a baby? If you’re still thinking, then maybe it is time to give a thought to your sleep. As we grow old, we tend to neglect our sleep schedules and blame our “busy” life for that. In reality, instead of blaming our outer world, we forget to notice the importance of the most essential support foundation of our sleep — The Mattress. It cannot be stressed enough that the best mattress can save you from your worst nightmares of having extreme back pain issues or trouble falling asleep.

For a good night’s sleep, it is unfair to expect a peaceful sleep experience from an ordinary mattress. The power of a happy & peaceful good night’s sleep lies only with the best mattress. It can become a tricky task for some people to buy mattress online. For that reason, we are guiding you through a detailed comparison of the two best mattress brands in India. Here’s a guide that gives a detailed overview comparison of The Sleep Company and SleepyCat mattresses, including their, construction, Firmness Score, Comfort Level, Orthopedic Support, and more.

The Sleep Company

The Sleep Company is India’s leading comfort innovation company and the creator of the revolutionary patented SmartGRID mattress. Founded in 2019, the company aims to offer customers the best sleeping experience with SmartGRID technology that creates the ultimate comfort and optimal support to the body. The company has been single-handedly responsible for bringing India’s comfort technology ecosystem to the 21st century with its patented, revolutionary, SmartGRID technology. Today, with a wide range of products, it is revolutionizing the way people sleep and sit.

SleepyCat

Established in the year 2017 With a mission to provide you with the best sleep experience, SleepyCat has simplified and curated a range of premium sleep products that are manufactured and delivered to your doorstep at factory prices. The brand is built to offer a personalized shopping experience with its unique concept of delivering comfort in a box, anywhere across India.

The Sleep Company Vs SleepyCat — Which is better?

The Sleep Company and SleepyCat are two leading mattress brands in India. While they are perhaps best known for their unique quality of mattresses online, both have believed in delivering the best sleep experience for their users.

The Sleep Company’s SmartGRID mattress has revolutionized the sleep industry with its exceptional SmartGRID Technology that instantly adapts to your body movements and provides both soft luxurious comfort and firm back support.

While the SleepyCat mattress has a gel memory foam layer that contours to the body and provide lumbar spinal support during sleep.

However, the memory foam tends to collapse underbody which can further result in back pain issues and chronic body pain problems.

The Sleep Company focuses not only on providing budget-friendly mattresses online but also on the quality of its product. The new sleep innovation of SmartGRID Technology is what makes the brand stand out among the rest. Therefore, if you consider buying the best orthopedic mattress online, then you won’t be disappointed in the least with The Sleep Company. Smart Ortho mattress is designed especially for those with severe back pain problems.

The Sleep Company mattress and SleepyCat mattress are indeed different in regard to firmness and feel. While both mattresses are providing medium firmness. The Sleep Company scores 7.5/10 in terms of firmness and provides a perfect soft yet firm balance that suits all sleepers.

The Sleep Company has a range of four acclaimed mattresses — Smart Luxe, Smart Ortho, Smart Luxe Hybrid, and Smart Ortho Hybrid. The one factor that makes them unique from any ordinary mattresses is the SmartGRID Technology which is designed after years of extensive research that aims to suit the different sleep requirements of all sleepers.

Considering all the factors in mind, we have finally arrived at the conclusion that both mattresses provide an excellent sleep experience with their different & unique mattress features. However, If you are looking for the perfect balance of both orthopedic support and luxury comfort then there is no better option than the SmartGRID mattress.
